verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: ny] [ARG0: naval militia] [V: tests] [ARG1: new landing craft] [ARGM-LOC: in rensselaer rensselaer] the new york naval militia practice loading a vehicle on board its new landing craft on the hudson river on friday the naval militia military emergency boat service known as mebs operates nine other watercraft and responds to state emergencies helps law enforcement agencies and supports the coast guard rensselaer new york naval militia military emergency boat service hudson river ny naval militia landing craft
